        public void createTable()

        Each DAO class need to define how to create the table

      • addMessage

        public java.lang.String addMessage(com.oracle.email.to.MessageTO messageTO)
                            throws com.oracle.email.exception.DAOException
        This method takes a messageTO and persist it into the Message table. After that for all TO, CC, BCC it sets the email to their INBOX folder and for the sender it sets the message to SENT folder.
        Parameters:
        messageTO - - with all the information about the message
        Returns:
        - unique messageId
        Throws:
        com.oracle.email.exception.DAOException - if message fail to be persisted

      • deleteMessage

        public boolean deleteMessage(java.lang.String messageId)
        To delete a message using the primary key.
        Parameters:
        messageId - - primary key of Message table
        Returns:
        - true when successful otherwise false

      • getMessage

        public com.oracle.email.to.MessageTO getMessage(java.lang.String messageId)
        This method returns message using the primary key messageId
        Parameters:
        messageId - - primary key of the Message table
        Returns:
        MessageTO with all the information about the message.

      • getMessages

        public java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.util.List<com.oracle.email.to.MessageTO>> getMessages(java.lang.String userId)
        This method returns all the messages for userId ordered by folder name and sorted by date
        Parameters:
        userId - - primary key of user table
        Returns:
        Hashtable with key as folderName and value as list of messages ordered by date

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
